Class MainWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.organization4242.delmgorb.controller.AbstractController
      • com.organization4242.delmgorb.controller.MainWindowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeListener, EventListener

    public class MainWindowController
extends AbstractController
    Represents controller used to bind MainWindowModel and MainWindowView.

    Murzinov Ilya
